post:
Hello!


We bring to you our latest stock clearance deals valid until July end. 
Unblock Netflix, Youtube, Amazon etc. see down.
Bonus you get 30% extra everything on any plan, any billing term.
includes extra RAM, CPU, Bandwidth, disk , IPv6 too  B) 

<br>

---------------------------

**How to apply?**
1. [**Place a new order**](https://my.webhorizon.in/order/main/index/kvm "**Place an order**") ,pay invoice. 
2. Either post your Order # OR Create a support ticket. 



[**See all Configurations - KVM VPS Poland**](https://my.webhorizon.in/order/main/packages/kvm/?group_id=40 "KVM VPS Poland") 🇵🇱

[**See all Configurations - KVM VPS Singapore**](https://my.webhorizon.in/order/main/packages/kvm/?group_id=12 "**KVM VPS Singapore**") 🇸🇬

(Select Annual for 1 month discount extra)
-----------------------------------

<br>

Example Plan - 1

1 CPU Core (65% dedicated, 100% burstable)

<br>

**Features**

* All use NVMe/SSD disks in RAID 1
* Includes backup option in panel
* Recently implemented - Live migration capability at Poland - megligible maintenance downtime.
* Balanced CPU - RAM ratio on all nodes.
* All nodes are connected to 1 Gbps dedicated ports.
* All of these can unblock various Online Streaming services including Netflix, Youtube, Amazon Prime, Hotstar, Dazn etc. see details below. 

<br>
